normalized: that was four years ago--
in those days, i was still a captain, leading a company as an aide of the jasant, and at the time, my missions were on earth…
my missions in those days consisted of kidnapping new solar key figures.
of course, once i had kidnapped them, i would transport them back to the jasant and have them brainwashed.
my target was admiral george bishop.
a famous new solar army commander experienced with the hardships of contesting the colonized planets so far.
his betrayal through brainwashing was suppose to have brought a great advantage to the neo terrors.
as for me commanding my company, my team was in charge of kidnapping and transporting george bishop to a secret neo terror location.
the actual person in charge of military operations was major almaeda.
the major himself, directing the military operations from within a parked van near the state guest house.
i appeared there from that van.
distancing myself from that van, i directed my subordinates while observing the entrance from a hidden alleyway.

name: major almaeda
normalized: bohgan.
anything strange?
i heard the major's grating voice from the transmission terminal equipped and disguised in a way that one didn't even know it was there.
it was a confirmation to begin the last stages of the military operation.

name: bohgan
normalized: all green, major

name: major almaeda
normalized: good, well then, execute your directive.
ready your weapons!
at the major's instruction, i retrieved the gun i had concealed in a gap at my feet.
and then, using the transmission terminal, i hurled out the instructions to my subordinates.

name: bohgan
normalized: curtis, slowly bring the vehicle to the back of the guest house

name: curtis
normalized: --roger

name: bohgan
normalized: …each of you cover the vehicles.
withdraw as far as lenin street after that.
mason, warm up the engine

name: mason
normalized: roger
but--!?
the situation here had suddenly changed.
all of a sudden, an urgent jarring noise entered my transmission terminal.

name: bohgan
normalized: ――wha!?

name: major almaeda
normalized: emergency contact!
the target is an impostor!
abort the operation!
abort the operation!
everyone withdraw….

name: bohgan
normalized: wh, what…!?
resounding gunshots.
screams conflicting with angry voices.
together with a violent explosion, the van that major almaeda was in, along with several soldiers, suddenly exploded and had gone up in flames.
i also heard gunshot after gunshot from behind the state guest house--

name: bohgan
normalized: curtis, report your status!

name: bohgan
normalized: jack, erin!
chase, mason!
respond!

name: bohgan
normalized: shit!

name: 部下の声
normalized: captain, gun turtle!
it's a gun turtle!
guuaah!?

name: bohgan
normalized: wha, what…!?
i opened my eyes wide in terror at the voices of my subordinates jumped into my crackling radio.
gun turtle--a self-propelled robot soldier.
handling them was difficult, so they were seldom seen on the battlefield, but the power its guns and armor held were out right deadly to any soldier….
it's said that they are capable of taking out as many as three platoons with just one machine.

name: bohgan
normalized: wh, why the hell is a gun turtle in a place like this!?
i went rigid, overcome with surprise.
i too prepared myself as that gun turtle came into my sight out of nowhere.
as for this perpetrator that had blown up the van major almaeda was in, perhaps they too hadn't known about the gun turtle.

name: aaron
normalized: shiit!
my subordinates at my side were going into a state of panic at the barrage of gunfire by the gun turtle.

name: bohgan
normalized: what!?
retreat!
the gun turtle will eat us alive with that 9 millimeter!
however, my voice hadn't reached my subordinates' ears that had fallen into chaos.

name: bohgan
normalized: aaron, edgar, retreat!
we're retreating!

name: bohgan
normalized: jamming!?
were our operations leaked to the enemy!?
everyone was their own unit, isolated and completely helpless.
gunshots were ringing out here and there, and with losing the ability to command my force, things weren't looking good.
shit…what to do!
what the hell should i do…!?
in order to escape from this dilemma, i frantically reaccessed the current circumstances in my brain.

name: bohgan
normalized: shit…am i going to die in a place like this!
i returned the gun back to the gap and disposed of all of the equipment i was carrying.
in any case, i have no choice but to run away from here--!
seeming to convince myself of that, i began walking at a quick pace.
all of a sudden, a gun turtle came in front of me and blocked my path.
hey!
stop!
a woman's voice departed from the gun turtle.

name: bohgan
normalized: kuu--!?
a chill ran up my spine as i was assailed by fear, so i turned and tried running away.
but--!?
i said to stop!

name: bohgan
normalized: guwaah!?
someone nimbly brushed me off my feet, flipping me over in an unshapely way.

name: bohgan
normalized: --kuu!?
confused, i looked up at the person who had brushed me off my feet.

name: bohgan
normalized: uu!?
…eh!?
there, wearing computer terminal goggles, stood a woman dressed in a woman's universal federation military uniform.
kuu!?
a computer terminal using goggles…
that means, she's operating the gun turtle….
this woman!?
are you with them too!?
resisting is useless!
it was at that moment.
i was confident of two things.
the first, that this bossy woman had just slaughtered my superior officer and my subordinates using a gun turtle.
and the second thing--!
this woman…i was 100% convinced that i was going to form a kidnap group for her.

name: bohgan
normalized: th, that's not it!
since i heard gunshots, i panicked and thought to try and run away!
on instinct, i tried to trick her into thinking that i was a civilian.
my braincells had gone into desperation about falling into a dilemma like this.
i was still young and already i had a status of that of captain.
hogoohh!

name: bohgan
normalized: gohaah!?
i was suddenly kicked in my stomach, folding over in agony.

name: bohgan
normalized: guu!?
you'd better be honest for your own good
cold eyes, like ice, pierced into my body, trembling with anger and humiliation.
goddamnit…this fucking woman!?
no, it's ok!
stay calm…stay calm!
i tried desperately to get control of myself.

name: bohgan
normalized: it, it's true…i have nothing to do with it!
i have no idea what you're talking about--!?
well then, what are you doing in a place like this!?

name: bohgan
normalized: uu, th, that is…!?
are you not going to answer me!?

name: bohgan
normalized: hii!
i'll tell you!
i'll tell you, so stop!
i, after having another strong kick in my stomach, showed a cry that seemed to make my voice turn inside out in a clumsy way.
and then, as i pleaded to the oppressive woman solider, i showed her my fake id and fake profile and explained to her any excuse that came directly to mind.
…you came down this street sightseeing then…

name: bohgan
normalized: y, yes…
so, you heard there were high class prostitutes in this neighborhood, and you turned up here?

name: bohgan
normalized: th, that seems to be…

name: bohgan
normalized: …uu!?
the woman scowled at me, giving me a look that seemed to be trying to see through my deception.
oh no.
a cold sweat trickled down my spine.
--naomi
…aah

name: bohgan
normalized: …uh!?
and there, a woman i presumed as her commander, turned up.
ahh….
she is…!?
i know that woman's face.
she, for sure was--lieri bishop.
a mere woman who had become the army military police investigation department's senior investigator and a major of the new solars.
and now, here with today's target…
the only daughter of admiral george bishop, and identical to her father, she has exposed injustice of the leaders of the neo terrors, resulting in serious damage.
lieri glanced at me with suspicious eyes before turning to face naomi.

name: lieri
normalized: this man, is he armed or have communications equipment?

name: naomi
normalized: no.
he has nothing.

name: lieri
normalized: i see
lieri stared at me fixedly, appraising me once more with her eyes.

name: bohgan
normalized: …uh!?

name: lieri
normalized: in that case, there's no reason to prosecute him.
let him go

name: naomi
normalized: ehh!?
b, but…!?

name: lieri
normalized: naomi.
our duty now is to protect my father from being kidnapped… that's right, isn't it?

name: naomi
normalized: y…yes…

name: lieri
normalized: evidence of that ringleader will turn up soon

name: lieri
normalized: even if he is connected to this event, minor figures like him would be little use to us
wha, what…!?
i frantically restrained myself in unintentionally blurting out my feelings.
y, you bitch…i…i look like a small figure!?
i nonchalantly watched lieri.
the haughty woman soldier's eyes were unfeeling, like seeing me as utter roadside trash.
kuu, don't look at me like that you bitch!
but, in my current situation, no matter how chagrined i was as a thin smile came upon my face, i had no choice but to be obsequious to the brazen admiral's daughter.

name: lieri
normalized: however…with that said, buying sex is a foolish act that is prohibited by law.

name: bohgan
normalized: …ehh?

name: lieri
normalized: hand him over to the local police

name: naomi
normalized: yes ma'am

name: bohgan
normalized: w, wait just a minute!
i raised a loud voice, perplexed by the unexpected turn of events,
taking my hand like that, naomi pulled on me with a jerk.

name: naomi
normalized: hey, come quietly

name: bohgan
normalized: w, wait!
the police… hey, quit joking around--
the gun turtle user referred to as naomi, sent another unforgiving kick to my side.

name: bohgan
normalized: guu, guhaa…!?
the woman's nimble kick was characteristic of someone who was highly trained in the martial arts, as i rolled about on the ground in pitiful agony.

name: naomi
normalized: …hmph!
you should be grateful of ms.
lieri's compassion
naomi looked down on me with eyes like looking upon garbage and grabbed a hold of the nape of my neck, beginning to drag me along.

name: bohgan
normalized: hii…uh!?
l, let me off just this once…!
i pleaded to her in an unsightly way while being dragged along in tatters.

name: naomi
normalized: be silent.
i'm handing you over to the police.
buying sex is a serious crime!

name: bohgan
normalized: kuu…!?
pl, please let it go this time!
curbing my anger exploding inside me, i requested earnestly as i clung on to naomi's foot.
if i'm not mistaken, buying sex is a felony in the universal federation.
i'd probably get at least half a year even if it was just attempted.
moreover, my jail sentence would be certain even as a first-time offender.
furthermore, if i were sent to the slammer, my social position would be in jeopardy.

name: naomi
normalized: don't touch me, slimeball!

name: bohgan
normalized: guwaah….
naomi mercilessly kicked me clinging on to her.

name: bohgan
normalized: ogaah, guwaah….
my lips cut, spreading the taste like that of iron inside my mouth.

name: naomi
normalized: i detest scumbags like you who pay for women

name: bohgan
normalized: uguuwaah….
and then.
my unshapely form fainted.
naomi ordered her subordinates to deliver me to the local police like that.
my ribs that had been broken by naomi at that time, still ache on cold days.
i spent half a year languishing in disgrace in prison.
every time i remembered lieri's eyes full of scorn, an anger resuscitated inside me.
if i thought about it, i had been rising in rank smoothly before that setback.
remembering that time even now, my guts were seized by thoughts that made them boil.
perhaps those two had completely forgotten about that man who they had tossed in jail for buying sex.
but me, i hadn't forgotten that humiliating event for even one day.
as soon as i had gotten out of prison, i had changed my identity and returned to doing secret missions.
and then, anticipating those two as the neo terrors' largest threats, i had endeavored in advancing my career and training in secret.
as a result of that, i had finally achieved the rank of major and climbed up to captaining the jasant.

name: bohgan
normalized: ――eh!
--having become apprehended by those abominable memories, i made myself come to my senses.
while a cold, blue flame burned in my heart, i persisted in looking over their documents.

name: bohgan
normalized: …ohh.
lieri is married?

name: bohgan
normalized: two years ago…to a new solar officer… major yuu amada

name: bohgan
normalized: kukuu, how typical of lieri to choose to keep her family name
now interested in lieri's husband, i read over major yuu amada's data.

name: bohgan
normalized: …indeed.
lieri fell for a young weapons development prodigy….
about lieri's fastidious personality… while holding that sort of beauty, i am sure there are little to no men equal to her.
i wonder if she's satisfied having amateur sex with a weak man like him.
fufuu, her training will be fruitful, i'm sure…

name: bohgan
normalized: for the sake of you…no, for the sake of you and your cute protegee, i've been devising a special plan for a long time.
i think you'll be pleased…kukuku
the jasant, heading towards planet titan, hid lustful brutes in its womb, as that large bulk began swimming freely in the peaceful cosmos.
